name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, especially single-page applications.

name: Java
description: A versatile, object-oriented programming language used for web, desktop, and mobile applications.

name: C
description: A foundational programming language used for system software, embedded systems, and performance-critical applications.

name: HTML5
description: The latest version of the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

name: ARM Asm
description: Assembly language for ARM processors, used in embedded systems and low-level programming.

name: SQL
description: A domain-specific language for managing and querying relational databases.

name: Python
description: A high-level, interpreted programming language used for web development, automation, data analysis, and more.

name: Lua
description: A lightweight scripting language often used for embedded systems and game development.

name: Verilog
description: A hardware description language used to model electronic systems and design digital circuits.

name: .NET Core
description: A cross-platform, open-source framework for building modern web, desktop, and cloud applications.

name: Git
description: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.

name: Leadership
description: The ability to guide teams, manage projects, and drive successful outcomes in collaborative environments.
